title: Monitor Company Info on LinkedIn
description: Monitor a company's details on LinkedIn and get an alert when their details or employees list change

title: Extract Products from Product Hunt
description: Scrape the list of products on ProductHunt for a specific keyword and/or category. Download it as a spreadsheet or monitor it for changes over time

title: Get Google search results
description: Extract Google search results (organic and paid) for a keyword. Download them as a spreadsheet

title: Find a person's social media profile links
description: Enter a person's name and get a list of links to all their social media profiles.

title: Monitor organic Google search results
description: Monitor organic Google search results for a specific keyword. Get a notification when the results or their orders change.
